headline: Is it the Right Time to Hold STERIS Stock in Your Portfolio?
summary: STE stays on investors' radars due to the strength of its Healthcare arm and strong rebound potential in the AST segment.

headline: 3 Healthcare Stocks Facing Headwinds
summary: Healthcare companies are pushing the status quo by innovating in areas like drug development and digital health. But speed bumps such as inventory destockings have persisted in the wake of COVID-19, and over the past six months, the industry has pulled back by 14.8%. This performance was worse than the S&P 500’s 8.5% decline.
